name: Pylon
headline: Infrastructure management software for water & electricity companies
description:
Pylon provides water and electricity distribution companies, in emerging markets, with a platform for reducing their losses as well as opening new revenue streams. These losses are coming from leakages, consumption thefts, and uncollected bills, amongst others.
We have signed 11 utilities onto our platform across 2 countries and connected our systems to over 560k endpoints.
Today our average client has reduced their aggregate revenue losses by 45%
Expanding in Africa, LATAM, and SEA.

founders.name: Ahmed Ashour, Founder
founders.description: I've worked in the metering and Energy business for over 12 years. I've led the development and implementation of smart metering technologies in Africa, the Middle East, Europe, and Asia. I'm also a board member of Prime Alliance, the leading organization working on developing a new open, public, and non-proprietary telecom solution in the smart metering business.

founders.name: Omar Radi, Founder
founders.description: I have over 14 years in the software development business delivering over 100 software projects catered for various industries. I am one of the early adopters of utility management platforms in Egypt and the Philippines. I've been a leading member of the team responsible for implementing the Egyptian Smart Meter Standard.

  * Products
### 
Utility Management Platform
Empower utilities with Pylon's Utility Management Platform – an integrated, smart solution for real-time oversight and optimization of energy and water distribution networks.
[Discover More](https://www.pylonump.com/</products/utility-management-platform>)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg height='8192' width='5461' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

  * ### 
Energy Management System

[Discover More](https://www.pylonump.com/</products/energy-management-system>)

Projects
## Our Solutions in Action
### 
Witness the impact of Pylon's cutting-edge solutions through our showcase of real-world projects.
[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg height='426' width='640' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Madinaty](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/xfnv1cfk/test/4947b287f8cb08129ad91eb584a944dbbe41af35-640x426.jpg?w=640&h=426&auto=format)](https://www.pylonump.com/</projects/madinaty>)
#### [Madinaty](https://www.pylonump.com/</projects/madinaty>)
Egypt’s largest residential compound selected Pylon to deploy & operate its 50,000+ smart meter infrastructure.
[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg height='713' width='1268' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Mostakbal City](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/xfnv1cfk/test/4ad94380aedcde70be675104281e1658ef91b288-1268x713.jpg?w=1268&h=713&auto=format)](https://www.pylonump.com/</projects/mostakbal-city>)
#### [Mostakbal City](https://www.pylonump.com/</projects/mostakbal-city>)
Mostakbal-Urban Developments is considered the first integrated Mega Green City in New Cairo City with a new concept of modern living.
[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg height='2667' width='4000' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Yopal, Colombia](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/xfnv1cfk/test/1888be56bc4998a7a47559b5c96f20d8477d2f86-4000x2667.jpg?w=4000&h=2667&auto=format)](https://www.pylonump.com/</projects/Yopal, Colombia>)
#### [Yopal, Colombia](https://www.pylonump.com/</projects/Yopal, Colombia>)
Yopal, Colombia selected Pylon to deploy and manage Smart Energy Management for 1,000+ transformers, aiming to reduce energy losses, enhance efficiency, and optimize energy distribution.

generated_description:
### Pylon: Revolutionizing Utility Management

Pylon, founded in 2017 and currently part of Y Combinator’s S21 batch, is making significant strides in the realm of infrastructure management for water and electricity utilities, focusing particularly on emerging markets. Headquartered in Cairo, Egypt, with a dedicated team of 17 employees, Pylon's mission is straightforward yet ambitious: to empower utility companies to reduce losses and tap into new revenue streams. 

Losses in these sectors can often stem from leakages, consumption theft, and uncollected bills. Pylon offers a transformative platform that has already signed up 11 utilities across two countries, managing over 560,000 endpoints. The results speak for themselves: clients have seen an average reduction of 45% in their revenue losses. 

### What They Do

Pylon provides two main products:

1. **Utility Management Platform**: A comprehensive solution that offers real-time oversight and optimization of energy and water distribution networks.
2. **Energy Management System**: Designed to enhance sustainability, this tool helps organizations maximize operational efficiency while reducing their carbon footprint.

Their solutions aren't just theoretical; they’ve made tangible impacts in various projects. One notable example is Egypt’s largest residential compound, Madinaty, where Pylon oversees a smart meter infrastructure for over 50,000 units. They've also expanded their reach into cities like Yopal, Colombia, where they manage smart energy solutions for more than 1,000 transformers.

### Growth and Vision

With current expansions targeted at markets in Africa, Latin America, and Southeast Asia, Pylon aims to broaden its influence and deliver reliable utility solutions tailored to the unique challenges of these regions. Their vision aligns with a larger goal: to make smart utility solutions accessible and efficient for everyone.

### Funding and Support

Pylon is backed by significant investors, including:

- **British International Investment (BII)**
- **Endure Capital**
- **Y Combinator**
- **Khawarizmi Ventures**
- **Cathexis Ventures**

This backing not only validates their business model but also supports their ongoing efforts to innovate in the utility management space.

### Connect with Pylon

To learn more about Pylon and explore what they can offer your utility company, visit their website at [pylonump.com](https://www.pylonump.com/). You can also reach out directly at info@pylonump.com or call +201111919670. They’re always keen to discuss partnerships or provide demos to potential clients.

In a world where resource management is increasingly critical, Pylon is positioning itself as a frontrunner in helping utilities harness technology for better management and profitability. It's clear: they’re not just about managing utilities; they’re about reshaping the future of energy and water management.
